text: Horst Paulmann Kemna (22 March 1935 â€“ 11 March 2025) was a German-Chilean billionaire entrepreneur. He is founder and chairman of Cencosud, the largest retail chain in Chile and the third largest in Latin America. According to Forbes, his fortune is estimated at US$4.8 billion, and the second richest man in Chile. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Chilean businesspeople
title: Horst Paulmann
